test.name: array_join
test.query: SELECT count() FROM (SELECT [number] a, [number * 2] b FROM system.numbers) AS t ARRAY JOIN a, b WHERE NOT ignore(a + b)
SELECT count() FROM (SELECT [number] a, [number * 2] b FROM system.numbers) AS t LEFT ARRAY JOIN a, b WHERE NOT ignore(a + b)
SELECT count() FROM (SELECT [number] a, [number * 2] b FROM system.numbers) AS t ARRAY JOIN a, b WHERE NOT ignore(a + b) SETTINGS enable_unaligned_array_join = 1
